name: Call of the DeInforcement
description:
WARNING: Contains a background that can be a problem for people with motion sickness

An Arcade Shooter were you play as an Alien Seahorse named Jerry the 3rd and shoot down big shapes that are shooting you with BIG projectiles.  Shooting them with a spear reveals that the big shapes are actually 2 smaller shapes that have been Joined Together.  You can pick em off individually, or shoot one of them with an energy wave that replaces your default projectile with the one the smaller shape was using.  Shooting the bigger shapes rewards more points.

Made in 2 days for the GMTK game jam.

Game made by Luke Buckley(Me)

Music by PenCameraMouseProductions

Sound effects from Sound effects lab (Japanese website)

GMTK logo by Mark Brown
